Discover the style that women most love is what MEROKEETY love to do, we are delighted to see every piece of clothing will bring our customers a comfortable wearing experience.

Classic, Comfy, Fashion, All For You!

How did we get our start?

MEROKEETY grows from a small seller who manufactures women’s apparel for branded apparel into one of the biggest international women’s apparel sellers on Amazon.

What makes our products unique?

Each piece of MEROKEETY is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort. And you’ll find a series of women’s NEW fashion each season, we share new trends, outfit inspiration, and fashion style to help women stay in style.

Why do we love what we do?

Happy customers, wearing great fashions, define the unique family that makes up the MEROKEETY brand.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13.3 x 10.67 x 2.83 inches; 1.15 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ MKSweatshirt10-B-ZipCharcoal-S
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 11, 2020
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08HT16X1V

Imported
Machine Wash
Size Guide: Small=US 4-6, Medium=US 8-10, Large=US 12-14, X-Large=US 16. lightweight stretchy fabric, we accept 30 days money back!
Unique design: Long sleeve, V neck, quilted, stand collar, contrast on collar, contrast color, snap button closure
This top will give you all go the comfy and warm feels! Cozy-up by the fireplace with a good book in this adorable pullover! Quilted, long sleeve, high neck, pullover featuring snap closure details at neck.
Occasion: Casual style, party, daily life, office, school, working, going out ect. Perfect for with leggings,shorts, jeans.
Garment Care: Hand wash recommended with low temperature water, using mild gentle soap, no bleach

Women's Long Sleeve Button Sweatshirt Tops


  • This tops design with snap closure on the neck and chest pocket, fashion to wear outside to get more compliment.
  • Quilted panel, easy to put this on over your favorite long sleeve tees, bottoming shirt.

V Neck Quilted Patchwork Pullover

Occasion: Lightweight sweatshirt suitable for cold temperatures, great for your every-day's wear, wear it to office, school, take a vacation, or join a party is also perfect. Team up with skinny jeans and booties for a simple yet effective finish to your look.


Fit for Casual, daily life, work, vacation, part

  • Elasticized cuffs and hemline keep you warm and so fashionable in cool days.
  • Stand collar with button design gives an extra protection for your neck on chilly days.
